content.en: Adaptive control: Researchers are exploring how to develop supervisory control for complex systems that have unpredictable behavior. They are adapting existing algorithms to handle these non-deterministic systems. Additionally, they are working on designing supervisors for systems that are only partially observed, modifying optimal supervisors to operate under partial observation. The goal is to achieve robust and adaptive control in these systems.
content.da: Adaptiv kontrol: Forskere undersøger, hvordan man udvikler supervision for komplekse systemer med uforudsigelig adfærd. De tilpasser eksisterende algoritmer til at håndtere disse ikke-deterministiske systemer. Derudover arbejder de på at designe supervisorer til systemer, der kun er delvist observerede, og tilpasser optimale supervisorer til at fungere under delvis observation. Målet er at opnå robust og adaptiv kontrol i disse systemer.
